Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Today, Lawman Guitars is presenting... A 1964 Vintage Super Rare Oahu Super Seven Shortscale Guitar with the Super Hot Valco Made, Supro Single Coil Pickup! ....A great looking original white finish! …and what a beautiful color it is…Comes with the shown original Softshell Case thats also in very good shape... I have never seen one of these Super Seven Guitars with an Oahu Logo on it. Exactly the same as the Supro Super Seven, just a different logo. Very very RARE!! This cool short scale guitar is in fantastic shape. Very few dings and such.....see pics...That pickup is a killer…single coil Valco made Supro pickup..They called it a Bell Tone...very descriptive...it really sings! if you haven’t heard one of these..expect to be impressed…the dating label on the back of the headstock dates it 1964 to 1968. They only made this model two years..1964 and 1965...Its one of those years... It is Very Light!! Only weighs 5 lbs ...It has a 22 inch short scale neck which makes it super easy to play....Very unique!! ... This Supro USA Made Oahu guitar has the original Neck, body, Pickup, Kluson Tuners, Bridge and tailpiece. . All ORIGINAL !!! There was one broken tip on the pickguard which we rerouted. See pic 4. This beauty is all original including the Double Line Kluson Tuners and foil serial number sticker on the back of the headstock... It appears that the tone pot was replace some time ago..it looks older but not original...see pics... Ever hear these Supro Pickups??...You are in for a treat...Very Hot and bright which made them very nice for early 60's Rock, but crank it up and it is a Blues Monster that cannot be ignored on stage...yes, its that good!!...The neck action is as good as it gets.. Our Techs did a great job setting this guitar up...it has easy playing low low action...It is a pleasure to play........ Now this guitar is very nice but given its age it is sold as-is and is not returnable, however, I have been hand picking my customers guitars for close to 20 years now and they have all loved the guitars I find...This one will be no exception... Thanks for checking out our cool guitars! Lawman Mike at Lawman Guitars Mike Lawman Guitars *********************************************************************************************************************************************** I work really hard to make all my guitars and accessories the best I can. I am, however, not perfect. If you are unsatisfied with any purchase from Lawman Guitars, please let me know. I am very happy to make it right. If you are a hard to please or routinely leave negative or neutral Ebay Feedbacks, please pass my auctions by.... 99% of Ebayers are great people to deal with.... I appreciate you all but lets all try to be nicer to one another with our Feedbacks...Thanks for listening, Lawman-Mike ********************************************************************************************************************************************** Rockin Lawman-mike Be sure to add me to your favorites list!
Title: 1964 Oahu by Supro Super Seven Short Scale Valco Pickup Pro Setup Original  Case
ConditionDescription: Very good condition. Minor dings and scratches as a used guitar.
